website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a small ice roller to use on your face and around your eyes, this smooth jade model has two roller ends to fit your needs.
pros: Made of jade that has a smooth finish and feels nice on the face
Has dual roller ends that are small enough to fit the contours of the face, including those around the eyes and mouth
Comes with a gua sha stone that's great for gentle facial massages
cons: Not intended for use on large areas of the body
Could chip or crack if you drop it

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe my eyes !
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant that this would actually work. I mean just a stone could take away my frown lines and wrinkles? OMG , after 1 use ( 15 minutes ) , I woke up the next day and couldn't believe my eyes ! This thing is freaking awesome! I use it every night now with my vitamin c serum. Look I'm almost 60, and thought I had to end up purchasing something really expensive to help with the crows feet and wrinkles, but this is doing the trick ! And it feels awesome on my face! Highly recommended this product!
customer_reviews.author: R. MCCARTER

customer_reviews.title: this feels good on face
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using this on my face I feel like it's working somehow. It feels like improving blood circulation than massaging with my hands. I feel like warmth. If you increase blood flow on surface you can get better results on everything. That's what my esthetician told me. Looking forward to improve my wrinkly face.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Never knew what I was missing! It feels so good! Lol love it. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Given

customer_reviews.title: Cool Jade
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jade roller due to all the benefits I’d read about and a friend recommended this one. I love how cold the stone feels on my skin, it’s helpful for relieving tension and headaches as well. It seems to be good quality and does not squeak when rolled.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! First time using this product and my skin looks and feels great! Very relaxing, cold stone , I can’t wait to see the results in a month! Totally recommended! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: fabiola

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! The first day I used it I could see a difference. My fine lines were definitely less noticeable, and the roller itself is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: R123

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: love it!!! The jade side is nice and cool and can even be stored in the refrigerator for an extra cool experience! I had a wrinkle under my left eye from years of pulling that I taunt to add eyeliner. After using this roller for about a month-and-a-half I have noticed quite a decrease in that wrinkle. I anticipate that that wrinkled will be gone within a couple more months! My fiance uses the little needle side because he has some old scarring. Something for everyone! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought after watching Liv Tyler's video about skin care. She's glowing, so honestly face massagers must do something. Feels delightful! Only used it for two days, but I usually get acne around this time and I haven't seen any recently. WIN.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a product like this before and I am really enjoying it. It came with a cute little storage bag. The stone stays nice and cool while using it.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t hurt!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hurt! I Have one of the longer needled ones and it kind of annoyed me every time I used it. Not a huge pain but a little... so as not wanting to be annoyed, I quit using it. This one with the .25 needles is perfect. It doesn’t hurt, it doesn’t even annoy me. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois F

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my self-care. Arrived just in time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Jade Roller & Gua Sha after a friend recommended it and saw the difference around her eyes, which is her problem area. A few days before mine arrived, I had developed a bad cold and I was feeling sick and tired and my face was very puffy. I looked pretty bad and thought that I'd have to wait days for the puffiness to go away. Within 12 hours of using the roller twice, all of the swelling was gone from my face and I looked refreshed and younger. It truly does move the lymph. Now, I'm looking forward to the long-term benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Grove

customer_reviews.title: Jade
customer_reviews.text: Feels lovely but have my doubts that it is merely a come on for sales
customer_reviews.author: LFS

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product and I absolutely love the jade roller. It fits in well with my morning routine and I use the roller in the morning after exfoliating and also to get a roll in my rose oil before I head out for the day. I usually dip it in some ice water for a few seconds before I use it because I just love the cold roller and I can see a visible improvement in my morning puffiness. The gua sha is a nice little plus and I use it around my jaw and to push the blood around my face. 10/10 recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: 100 Good For Your Face
customer_reviews.text: This roller is very helpful for improve the face shape! It’s actually make my chin smaller and look prettier. Also, I have face bloating on the mornings and the roller is pretty good for reduce that. Thanks ! Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Diana Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Love the roller, but the gua sha?
customer_reviews.text: The jade roller itself is beautiful, and it feels absolutely great on your skin. The gua sha, however, is not what I was expecting. I ordered this specifically for the gua sha, because I didn’t have one. It isn’t a jade color, but it’s almost clear with green specs, quite unattractive. I will use it anyway, I just don’t too much like the gua sha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Jade Roller
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Jade Roller! Everyone's talking about how these are the best tools for your face and I have to agree! It feels cool on my face and I have been using it daily! This is combination with my new skin regime, are going to erase the signs of aging! well I hope so anyway! Great deal and I can't wait to see visible results! I love the packaging too! Will make a great gift for my mom's birthday!
customer_reviews.author: jcooper

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift set
customer_reviews.text: I keep hearing about how great jade rollers are. I ended on purchasing this one because it came with a flat stone with it. Both came in a very nice sturdy box and even a travel bag thats black velvet. I ended up giving this as a mothers day gift since the packaging was so nice. Thanks for ghinking of the details.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Reduces swelling in eye
customer_reviews.text: I have seen lots of people using jade stone rollers in the past few months. I tried it myself and I noticed it helps reduce swelling in my eye area. It could be the jade, the rolling motion over the area or simply the fact the jade stone is cold when I use it, but it has reduced swelling in my eye area. I have not noticed another changes in my skin but the only issue I really have is eye swelling. I give it 5 stars because is gentle and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Nail Lady

customer_reviews.title: Facial massage and lymphatic drainage
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy rolling on the jade stone because not only does it give me a nice feeling of self-love by caring for myself, but I also soothes me mentally knowing about the healing and protective properties of jade stone.
customer_reviews.author: Lita Malave

customer_reviews.title: i feel young!
customer_reviews.text: it’s amazing, it helps with eye puffiness . wrinkles and my skin feels more firm. my dark circles also seem to diminish
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jade roller
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to add this jade roller to my skin care routine. It feels good on your skin and is easy to use. Refrigerate the roller for an even better experience. Comes with a black velvet bag for storage. The Gua Sha is beautiful and also feels amazing on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: LBeck

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for esthetics
customer_reviews.text: As an esthetician, I strive to provide the best quality treatments and products on my clients. Depsite the small price tag, this is a quality product and not "flimsy" looking or feeling at all. Can't wait to treat more clients with this beautiful tool!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica N.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and beneficial
customer_reviews.text: I watched a couple of YouTube videos wherein beauty influencers recommended jade facial rollers, so I had to try one. This is a wonderful product and the price is great for the quality! Like many people, I have started using facial oils and using this roller on my face after applying the oil not only helps the skin absorb the oil, but it feels like a treat. Side note, if you are an allergy sufferer, you will benefit from using this tool even more; it always makes my sinus headaches feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Simple addition to routine
customer_reviews.text: Love it and I would love it there was a video on using roller that is a how to and answers most popular questions
customer_reviews.author: allegra lyons

customer_reviews.title: Jade Facial Roller
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my mom. She's been wanting one for a while. This one is affordable and good quality. She says it's easy to use and only have a couple of weeks she can notice already notice a difference in her face. She like the soothing feeling on her face. I'd recommend this roller if you want to try one at a reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Armand & Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Easy, natural, anti-aging
customer_reviews.text: Been using the jade roller twice a day for a week and have noticed a change in my skin’s appearance. Under-eye bags are less puffy and a more even tone overall. I especially like the massage to my jaw line in the morning since I tend to clench my jaw overnight. The jade roller is super soothing. Would recommend adding to your beauty routine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely packaging and well made product! I can’t speak for its effectiveness yet but I love how cool and relaxing it feels on my face. I appreciated the little “how-to” card that it came packaged with. It would make a very nice gift - it looks very fancy!
customer_reviews.author: LottieK

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend. She loved it!! It came in a cute box for easy gifting. The item itself is very pretty and easy to use. It came with easy to follow instructions. I may have to purchase another one soon for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love my jade roller
customer_reviews.text: I love my new jade roller! It feels great rolled on your face with a little moisturizer or even alone. My teen daughter even enjoys it, very relaxing. Also came with a nice black bag for storage. Would be a good gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect presentation!
customer_reviews.text: This product was packaged so nicely!! The company really thought about the details with it! I loved the cold jade stone and it even came with an additional jade stone!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great for tired eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This jade roller is amazing! I especially love the little eye piece! I put them both in the fridge and take them out in the morning and go over my entire face after putting on my moisturizer. I definitely feel more awake after using the roller. It’s too early to tell if it’s helping my puffy eyes or anything else but I love the way my face feels after using everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dause

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and love the way it works!! The cool jade is so refreshing and relaxing, it feels like it is melting the stress and wrinkles away! Def recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new jade roller. I've only been using for about a week but can tell it is increasing circulation, and helps my serum and moisturizer absorb. It feels so nice and is quick and easy to add to my am routine. It came very well packaged and with a storage pouch. Customer service is top notch too - very responsive and helpful. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Poppi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After a long day this feels really good material is perfect I like using it at night before bed to relax
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help put my moisturizer on twice a day. Since using it my skin seems a lot less red and more supple. I keep mine in the fridge so it stays nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Fry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got the product today and I'm so excited to use it. Easy to use Jade Roller. Blends well with my serum and it's so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Zyra Palencia

customer_reviews.title: Eye de-puffing
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the fridge overnight and use it in the morning on my whole face and neck... It feels very refreshing, especially this week when I have a cold and my face feels red and puffy and yucky. Probably not its intended use but it’s working for me...
customer_reviews.author: Midwest mama

customer_reviews.title: Works best for me when both are chilled. So soothing!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased so I can’t say if it helps reduce lines yet however after first couple days my face is definitely softer! I love the little scraper! It works great to soothe visibly tense muscles! Love the roller right out of freezer!
customer_reviews.author: Kimliv123

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love using this after my face serum, it feels really good and feels like it helps seal in my facial products! Highly recomend! Super cute packaging too!
customer_reviews.author: asherer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the jade roller! Came with a bag and user guide that fits perfectly in the bag. I store mine in the fridge and use every morning as directed by the guide, and my the skin on my face feels stimulated.
customer_reviews.author: Bake388

customer_reviews.title: Great price point!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this brand was on the top10 list of the best jade rollers for the year and for the price you really can’t beat it. Love it and it works great after being put in the fridge for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: krysti

customer_reviews.title: A must for any women’s self-care routine
customer_reviews.text: The feel and quality of this roller is wonderful. No squeaking noises when rolling either the large or smaller end of the roller (as I had experienced with a previous purchase I had made from another seller), and the stone itself rolls very smoothly on the skin. I initially made this purchase after finding out from a friend whose father is a plastic surgeon that if more women used these rollers on a regular basis, he would not have 50% of his business. After using for about 1.5months, I’m thoroughly impressed. Wrinkles are a lot less noticeable, complexion looks great; my husband asked me what I started putting on my face because the change is remarkable for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Never tried one of these before, but I had heard good things, and Ive been trying to change up my skincare routine. So far I'm impressed. Haven't used it but a few times, but it feels great on my skin right before bed. I want to see what it can do in the morning with puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Jack P.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this roller. It is so smooth and cool on the skin!
customer_reviews.author: bellew24

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift but opened it to make sure everything was okay. It looks beautiful and everything was well packaged. I'm sure the person I'm gifting it to will love it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N

customer_reviews.title: So smooth applying on skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this product! I’ve used it for 4 days now and can already tell a difference in my skin. It’s softer and looks better. The roller is so easy to use and feels amazing on my skin! I will definitely keep using this amazing product! And the bag it comes with to store it is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and definitely in love! Love to use it in the morning,my face is happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cooling!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom to a newborn, I typically wake up looking and feeling very tired. However, rolling this jade roller on my face in the mornings has totally been perking me up. I love how nice and cooling it is on my face and how I can get a bit of “me time” in just a few moments. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ilana

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful after applying moisturizer. Cooling and helps to relieve stress after a long day!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Give this jade roller a try
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I decided to try this jade roller. I use it in the morning during my skincare routine to “wake” my complexion up. It feels super smooth and definitely makes a difference. The packaging is also super cute and everything came as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Zinkand

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my face!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it every morning after I put on moisturizer. It helps with blood circulation and reduces the puffiness under my eyes. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: anabelle angeles

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to morning routine
customer_reviews.text: This jade roller was a perfect addition to my morning routine. The visual directions helped me learn the direction to roll for best results for my skin. It has such a cooling effect—love how it feels under my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Motiv8now

customer_reviews.title: ASAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t expect the Immediate results. My face instantly woke up upon the first use. I can only imagine what the long term effects will be! Definitely apart of my day and night regimen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jade Facial Roller
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this item really works, but it does feel nice and feels relaxing. It seems to be a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Gadget, Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Jade roller came separated from prong. Reattached, okay, keep trying, but previous reviewers were right, this thing squeaks. The jade stone included as an extra works far better than the roller itself. Easier to control and form fits better to skin. Kind of a waste of money, but not totally dissatisfied. Knock offs are out there for far better deal. This is better presented, but seriously, it’s just a feel-good gadget, not a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Saucer

customer_reviews.title: Gem freaks dream
customer_reviews.text: I am a gem stone freak and have been so badly wanting to try out a Jade roller. This one is so amazing. I love the coolness rolling across my face with my favorite moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Soriah Prokopich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: The price is worth the value and more, this was a gift for my mother and she is beyond happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Drop the skin care routine sis!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have! I’m a very picky amazon shopper and after seeing other jade rollers, I decided to go with this company and so happy I did. Very good quality product, which is crazy for how low the price is. The customer service is phenomenal and the company actually cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Arla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: It has quickly become part of my morning routine. After applying serum, I use the roller and it feels cool, refreshing - and my skin feels soft and moisturized. I can really tell a difference!
customer_reviews.author: J Neesen

customer_reviews.title: Very cool...literally
customer_reviews.text: I love how cool this feels on my face and I like using it right after i'm finished moisturizing. I like the idea that it helps with circulation for my face. The two sides are super handy too. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: charmaine l.

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable jade roller
customer_reviews.text: These have become so popular I just had to try for myself to see what all the hype was about! It definitely helped with under eye puffiness, and it feels cool (even left out of the fridge/freezer) which helps me feel more awake first thing in the morning! I love that it came with a little pouch to keep it in too. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this roller for 3 days and I can already feel a difference in my skin. It feels right and tight! If you have big pores like me, you need this! I store it in the freezer and wipe down with alcohol after every use. So far the stone itself is withstanding the alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Nice packaging and it rolls so smoothly. Fast shipping as well !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryll Tan

customer_reviews.title: Darker jade but as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Jade set was darker than pictured but it works =) thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth testing out!
customer_reviews.text: I've been hearing about this kind of tool a lot lately and finally got to try one out. It feels really great on my skin and I could see results immediately as far as a glow to my skin but haven't used it long enough to see about the wrinkles yet. I feel like it will work well though. What is the flat white stone for though?
customer_reviews.author: carol dinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice roller! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: High quality roller!!!! Love it, put it in the freezer for extra puffiness relief.
customer_reviews.author: Mica Milojevic

customer_reviews.title: Your face will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This is like a massage for your face! I use this every night and can’t believe I didn’t discover this roller until now! It’s a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Groen

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: so easy to use and the cooling feel is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. My wife was excited when she opened it and realized what I bought for her. She ripped it out of the packaging and started using it on her face. She kept saying how great it felt. Thanks for helping me get beat something right when she needed a pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Carling

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Feels Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for Christmas presents for myself and some family members. I keep mine in the freezer and it's delightful to use in the morning and evening with my regular face routine. I feel refreshed and my skin already looks and feels better!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic! I was unsure of if I should even purchase a jade roller but it was worth it. This arrived and was perfect. Rolls easily and feels well built. No squeaking and very soothing all around.
customer_reviews.author: Claire H. Fanelli

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: Love all that I know about jade rollers and this one is great value! Works wonderfully and looks elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Jade Roller
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction of the roller. Like the protective bag that comes with it. I do notice and feel a difference in my skin when I use it. Would recommended use to anyone to use or to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Herek

customer_reviews.title: awesome product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: While I was assuming the product would be great, I would recommend this just for the seller's customer service alone. I had a minor issue with the roller I received and when I contacted the seller, she was SO quick to help me and provide me with a new one. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this item!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. Not to heavy but definitely heavy enough to tell it's good quality Jade. I would reccomend this roller to any of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Destinee H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I LOVE it! My husband even likes to use it the next morning when he had a little too much to drink the night before. Definitely helps with puffiness and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great jade roller. My skin looks refreshed and healthy and its also super relaxing to do.
customer_reviews.author: KMcWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Amazinggg
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Came in beautiful condition & works really good. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Xlj

customer_reviews.title: Too early
customer_reviews.text: Barely using this. I would update in a couple of weeks but looks promising!
customer_reviews.author: BABA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This roller glides very smooth and feels great on my skin. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift, very pretty package and easy to use. I just got this and was really impressed by how pretty it is! The jade roller comes with a velvet pouch and is beautifully packaged. The roller is really cool and relaxing on your skin. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Serpentine -  Commonly used in jade rollers, it's Synthetically treated to pass off as real jade
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT made of Jade. This is either made out of: Serpentine - Most commonly used in jade rollers, which is Synthetically treated to pass off as real jade! Or this is made of: Malaysian Jade - Chemically dyed and processed Or this is made of: Opaque dolomite marble - Heavily dyed with synthetic materials. No irregularities. Too perfect to be considered to have the natural properties of jade. Anyway you roll it...it's ALL CHEMICALLY-TREATED SYNTHETIC ~ Not a great choice to roll across the skin. In my opinion the tool itself is just plastic junk & I would never use it. Item returned & I do not recommend 😖
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This roller was everything that it was expected to be. It is great to put in the freezer and use with a face mask. It warms up pretty quickly if you keep it in the freezer. Great purchase for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked wonders for my face. Allergies have been terrible this season and this really helps to reduce the red puffiness in my face. Straight out of the freezer it feels great after a hot shower as well.
customer_reviews.author: Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Loved. Turned around and purchased one for my mom too shortly after receiving mine. It’s great at relieving tension in the face. Super relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Miller in VA

customer_reviews.title: extreme gentle touch, should use it with serum to maximize effect
customer_reviews.text: Since applying roller, especially with serum and some other cream, my face looks brighter with tighten skin. I normally washed my face with warm water then wait for 5 to 10 minute before applying serum with roller. This really is a relaxing time
customer_reviews.author: Arwa Moiz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and I love the way it makes my face feel in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Good - High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I watched a few videos on youtube about Jade Rollers and decided to try one out! My family has a history of wrinkles so I wanted to be proactive and found this one at a pretty good price. The Jade Roller is nice and heavy and feels like it will last. The look is very nice and it also helps relax my face. I like to do it in the mornings to help me wake up. I am really enjoying this product so far! Would recommend to others because of the quality and the effects in has on my skin & face.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My face is really clean and comfortable after using this roller. I would recommend it for my friends
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it will be a good buy
customer_reviews.text: As of now I give it 5 stars because it came on time, packaged in a clear plastic container for storage, and it was sealed shut. I used it once and it wasn’t painful. I just cleaned it with alcohol before and after I used it. Then I put on some moisturizer that I have. Hopefully it helps with my acne scars!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Esthetician recommenced!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Bought it after I had a facial that used one. I leave this in my fridge and roll it after I’ve applied my skincare. Feels sooo refreshing! And has real benefits
customer_reviews.author: Hoodschwinked

customer_reviews.title: I wish I purchased sooner! Fine lines gone!
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is not purchasing this sooner! I noticed a difference on the first try and it’s only gotten better ever since. I really wish I took a before and after. I had fine lines on my forehead that are now virtually gone and I’m using the same night time moisturizer I’ve always used. I can’t go a night without using this I’m so happy with my jade roller!
customer_reviews.author: Keila

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my morning routine!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and they feel so good! Would be such a great gift for anyone who deserves to add a little bit of pampering into their daily routine. Also, the roller doesn’t squeak a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Our Fine House

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Practical and good massage for my face. I am following the instructions. I’m excited to see what will happen.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Squared

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am happy of how my skin feels after every use of this product... It is a perfect addition to my facial routine and I feel the amazing difference of how my skin feels now than before using this product. I will definitely share this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Angelo Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely roller
customer_reviews.text: Cute packaging. And the vendor sent an email and guide on use before I even received the product. Pretty and high quality
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Protective packaging and sturdy roller
customer_reviews.text: I've long been wanting to try a jade roller. This one does not disappoint. It's so chilled and feels amazing on the skin! Sturdy well made roller.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This has become essential in my routine. It really works and it feels so good on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: This jade roller is of great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly, I didn't realize it came with the flat jade piece. I use it to scrape over the skin .This jade roller is of great quality. It's the perfect size and with the two ends can be used over the entire face. I highly recommend this roller.
customer_reviews.author: irma

customer_reviews.title: Helps!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been thinking about buying a jade roller for awhile. I'm happy I decided to finally buy one. I am loving this thing. It feels great rolling across your skin. It's so nice and cooling. I love using it on my eye bags early in the morning
customer_reviews.author: mistake robert

product_meta.title: Jade Roller and Gua Sha Set for Beautiful Skin Detox - Facial Body Eyes Neck Massager Tool Reduce Wrinkles Aging - Original Natural Jade Stone
feature_bullets: Essential Beauty Set - a facial skin massager roller for face, body, eyes, neck will cool, tighten, relax.
Handcraft Real Natural Jade - Genuine stone with ultra-smooth surface texture. Smooth touch, Long lasting, super easy to care.
Jade Roller - size approx 20x140x50mm. Can be used with your favorite face cream can help the cream to be absorbed more effectively
Guasha Scraper - size approx 50x80x5mm, a simple and efficient healing technique tool with immediately visible results.
Your Smile is Our Happiness - We know you'll love our products as much as we love making them for you. Send us a message for any reason that makes you not satisfied.
